title: Sports Event Calendar
description: Full-featured sports calendar with interactive navigation, event creation, and filtering by sport/date range. Features real-time state management, persistent LocalStorage, and mobile-first responsive design. Includes comprehensive unit testing with Vitest.
technologies: React, Vite, JavaScript, CSS3, Vitest, React Testing Library

title: FitTracker Mobile
description: Mobile-first fitness management app enabling trainers to manage exercises, clients, and track fitness goals. Redesigned frontend with modern UI/UX and full mobile responsiveness. Utilizes backend architecture with RESTful API integration for real-time data management.
technologies: React.js, Vite, JavaScript, RESTful API, Modern UI/UX

title: FitTracker
description: Full-stack fitness tracking application with Java Spring Boot backend and React frontend. Features JWT-based authentication, token refresh, protected routes, and PostgreSQL database. CRUD functionality for managing clients, workouts, and progress tracking.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, JWT Spring Security, React.js, PostgreSQL

title: GeoMyWish
description: Collaborative group shopping management tool built with MERN stack. Users create groups, manage multiple shopping lists, and add/edit products. Features real-time collaboration and MongoDB for data persistence.
technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, HTML/CSS, JavaScript

title: TinderBook
description: Server-side rendered social platform for book enthusiasts. Users browse, like, and match based on book preferences. Built with Handlebars templating, Express routing, and JWT authentication for secure user sessions.
technologies: JavaScript, Handlebars, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JWT

title: Space Aircraft
description: Interactive browser game using HTML Canvas for 2D graphics. Players control spacecraft with keyboard navigation to avoid obstacles. Features collision detection and score tracking system.
